turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like you to place a coffee order for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which coffee shop do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Either Peet's or Starbucks, what do you think?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok please order from the Starbucks on the corner of Clark and Deming.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you available to pick up now, or is this order for later?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have placed an order for a Grande Black and White Mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready in the store shortly. You will receive a receipt to your mobile device by text.
